front.title: •Ominous Rumors
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on Endor system if opponent controls no Endor sites. Your Force drains are +2 at up to X other battleground systems, where X = number of Endor sites you occupy. Effect canceled if opponent controls three Endor sites. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Rumors of a new 'technological terror' filled the galaxy with dread.

combo: Ominous Rumors + Endor: Bunker + Perimeter Patrol
